DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective , multi-center , single-arm study evaluate SIPS procedure . Subjects meet eligibility criterion consider study participation follow 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Multi-center , Single-arm Study Stomach , Intestinal Pylorus Sparing ( SIPS ) Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: SIPS single-anastomosis duodeno-intestinal switch procedure . Preliminary data Sanchez-Pernaute et al . ( Surg Obes Relat Dis 2013 ; 9:731 ) indicate procedure safe , quick perform , offer good result treatment morbid obesity metabolic comorbidities . CovidienTM plan investigate procedure propose prospective clinical study obtain data subject outcomes 12 month follow SIPS procedure .
DOC.criteria: The subject must 1865 year age The subject must willing able participate study procedure understand sign inform consent The subject consideration surgery obesity metabolic disease elect undergo primary SIPS procedure The subject BMI 3540 kg/m2 least 1 obesityrelated comorbidity BMI 4060 kg/m2 Any female subject pregnant , actively breastfeed Any subject consider part vulnerable population ( e.g . prisoner psychological concern without sufficient mental capacity ) The procedure emergency procedure The procedure revision/reoperation indication The subject unable unwilling comply study requirement followup schedule The subject condition , opinion investigator , appropriate study ( e.g . severe cardiovascular disease , history gastrointestinal ( GI ) malignancy , history upper GI surgery , open cholecystectomy , history intestinal surgery , immunosuppression , nonambulatory ) The subject estimate life expectancy le 6 month The subject participate investigational drug device research study within 30 day enrollment
